full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Standing Offer

**Title**: E6MON-24PQPQ - Provision of Boxed Lunches

**Reference Number**: WS4454135614-DOC4454135670

**Publication Date**: 2024-04-11
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-11T14:00:00

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

This Request for Standing Offer (RfSO) aims to acquire packaged combination meals (Repas complets sous emballage) for the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defense.

** Solicitation Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4454135614
* **Tender Status**: Annulé (Cancelled)

**Eligibility and Selection**

The tender is open to all qualified suppliers. The selection criterion is based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**

This competition is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Location and Delivery**

The location of the required goods is Quebec, Canada, with the delivery taking place to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at the specified address.

## Contact Information
To obtain further information or to submit your response, please contact Efoe Adjakly at efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Please note that there is no phone number or fax provided for this tender.  Best regards, Efoe Adjakly.
